|1effect=If a skill compares unit's Spd to a foe's or ally's Spd, treats unit's Spd as if granted +7.<br><br>Reduces damage from area-of-effect Specials by 80% (excluding Røkkr area-of-effect Specials).<br><br>Inflicts Atk/Spd-4 on foe, deals damage = difference between Spd stats + 5 (max 15; excluding area-of-effect Specials; if unit's Spd < foe's Spd, treats Spd difference as 0), reduces damage from foe's attacks by 20% of unit's Spd (excluding area-of-effect Specials), and neutralizes effects that prevent unit's counterattacks during combat.
|1cost=300
|1required=Velocity 3
}}
